page.title: 16HOVERCRAFT 2
page.content: In the mid 1950's Christpher Cockerall and Jean Bertin worked along similar lines of research into "air-cushion "effects, i.e. the Hovercraft.Cockerall produced his first working model in 1956.On 25th July 1959,the SRN1 successfully completed the first cross-channel hovercraft crossing (From Calais to Dover).By 1966 Hoverlloyd operated two 36 seater SRN6 hovercraft from Ramsgate to Calais. Seaspeed began operations during 1968 in Dover, with the SRN4 Mk1,between Dover East and Boulogne,adding the route Dover East to Calais in 1969.
